channel.title: Esp8266 on ASPBGJ

item.title: My Learning Curve In IoT World As A Web and iOS Developer
item.description: As a web developer and iOS developer, I didn’t know much about hardware or bare metal programming. I only learned about resistor, capasitor, transistor, etc when I was still in junior high school, thus my electronic knowledge is very limited. Arduino Uno R3. My First Board. I was interested for learning electronic again as a hobby around 2-3 years ago, when I read that Arduino is easy for learning micro controller programming.
